page.title: 02THE COUNTRYSIDE
page.content: This area of Kent is very beautiful with fine views of the North Downs. Most of the land which surrounds the village of Lenham is owned by three or four wealthy farmers who have conserved the natural beauty of the countryside. My name is Kathryn Sylvester and I am eleven years old.I live three and a quarter miles from Lenham Village in a bungalow in Warren Street.It can be really boring especially in long holidays when I have nothing to do. I suppose it is alright if you like walking but I dont. I might like walking if I had someone to walk with. I must admit there is Katy Gray but it is two miles to her house. All I do is stay indoors writing stories in front of the television or reading a book. I go for walks with the dog but a dog is not much company. To tell you the real
